segments.text: How about your study at college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was doing quite well at college . I completed my MBA degree in international trade with first-class honors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you select your college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I selected my college because it had an excellent academic reputation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you like doing in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My favorite recreation is cooking . I learned to cook Chinese dishes and western style dishes as well . It keeps me busy and makes me happy .
segments.speaker: S2
